thread.title: Lamar Odom taken from Las Vegas hospital to Los Angeles
thread.title_full: Lamar Odom taken from Las Vegas hospital to Los Angeles

title: Lamar Odom taken from Las Vegas hospital to Los Angeles
text: > Entertainment Lamar Odom taken from Las Vegas hospital to Los Angeles FILE - In this April 30, 2012, file photo, Khloe Kardashian Odom and Lamar Odom from the show "Keeping Up With The Kardashians" attend an E! Network upfront event at Gotham Hall in New York. A family representative says Lamar Odom has left a Las Vegas hospital and is now in the Los Angeles area to continue his recovery a week after being found unconscious at a Nevada brothel. Alvina Alston, publicist for Odom's aunt JaNean Mercer, said Tuesday, oct. 20, 2015, that the former NBA star was transported by helicopter from Sunrise Hospital and Medical Center in Las Vegas around 5 p.m. Monday. (AP Photo/Evan Agostini, File)
